    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Absence
    Represents a student absence in the school management system.
    AbsenceDAO
    Data Access Object for Absence entities.
    AbsenceDAOTest
    Test class for AbsenceDAO.
    AbsenceForm
    Form for managing student absences with input validation
    AddGradeForm
    Form for adding a new grade with input validation
    AddStudentForm
    Form for adding a new student with input validation
    BaseDAOTest
    Base class for all DAO tests.
    ClassGroup
    Represents a class group in the school management system.
    ClassGroupDAO
    Data Access Object for ClassGroup entities.
    ClassGroupDAOTest
    Test class for ClassGroupDAO.
    DatabaseConnection
     
    EditStudentForm
     
    Grade
    Represents a grade in the school management system.
    GradeDAO
    Data Access Object for Grade entities.
    GradeDAOTest
    Test class for GradeDAO.
    Homework
    Represents a homework assignment in the school management system.
    HomeworkDAO
    Data Access Object for Homework entities.
    HomeworkDAOTest
    Test class for HomeworkDAO.
    HomeworkForm
    Form for adding or editing homework assignments
    HorizontalTeacherDashboard
    Horizontal teacher dashboard with navigation buttons at the bottom.
    LoginForm
    Login form for the School Management System.
    Parent
    Represents a parent in the school management system.
    ParentDAO
    Data Access Object for Parent entities.
    ParentDashboard
    Horizontal parent dashboard with navigation buttons at the bottom.
    ParentDetailsDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for parent details including user information.
    RegistrationForm
    Registration form for the School Management System.
    SchoolManagementStarter
    Main starter class for the School Management System.
    SchoolManagementSystem
     
    Student
    The Student class represents a student with properties such as student ID, class ID, first name, last name, address, and parent ID.
    StudentDAO
    Data Access Object for Student entities.
    StudentDAOTest
    Test class for StudentDAO.
    Teacher
    Represents a teacher in the school management system.
    TeacherDAO
    Data Access Object for Teacher entities.
    TeacherDetailsDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for providing detailed information about a teacher.
    TestDatabaseConnection
    Test version of DatabaseConnection that uses H2 in-memory database.
    User
    Represents a user in the system, which can either be a parent or a teacher.
    User.AccountType
    Enum representing the different types of user accounts.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object for User entities.
    UserDAOTest
    Test class for UserDAO.
